item.description:
Kent Clothier presents

Build Your Buyers List Instantly With Cash Buyers

After this meeting you will instantly have access to over 150,000 cash buyers EVERY MONTH.

GAME CHANGING STUFF!!!

Seriously . . . this is how this list will help you:

Instant buyers list for all your future real estate deals
Tens of thousands of saved dollars when you sell the property instead of a realtor because you have a list of cash buyers
You can work backwards: find out what deals the cash buyers want and then go find them a deal and flip it to them
REO flips will be so much easier when your buyer doesn't need a loan
Pre-foreclosure-Short Sale A to B - B to C closings are easier as well because there will be no seasoning issues
Just put in your state, your county, and the value of the property sold and hit submit . . . and voila you have a list of every cash buyer:

the property address they bought
the date they closed
how much they paid
their full name
their mailing address
Get ready to be blown away! You don't want to miss this one!

Monthly Meeting

Thursday, September 16, 2010

Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

free for members; only $25 for guests

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
